Title.Text: S İ P A R İ Ş D E T A Y L A R I

Grid.Name: Sipariş Tipine Göre
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem0] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem2] In (?Year) And [DataItem5] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem6] In (?UretimDurum)

Grid.Name: Siparişler Kalite Bazlı
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem5] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem5] <> '20.T.Üretim' And Not Contains([DataItem6], 'ELF') And [DataItem7] In (?Year) And [DataItem8] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem2] In (?UretimDurum)

Grid.Name: Siparişler İşletme Bazlı
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem5] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem4] <> 'NUMUNE İPLİK' And [DataItem0] <> 'Diğer' And [DataItem6] In (?Year) And [DataItem8] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem7] In (?UretimDurum)

Grid.Name: Siparişler Boyama Bazlı
Grid.FilterString: [DataItem0] <> 'FİTİL' And [DataItem0] <> 'TOPS' And [DataItem0] <> 'BUMBS' And [DataItem0] <> 'Diğer' And [DataItem5] In (?Year) And [DataItem6] In (?UretimDurum) And [DataItem7] In (?EvrakDurum)

Pie.Name: İşletme Tipine Göre
Pie.FilterString: [DataItem3] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem4] In (?UretimDurum) And [DataItem0] <> 'Yeni Numune Üretim' And [DataItem0] Is Not Null And [DataItem0] <> 'Diğer' And [DataItem5] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem5] <> '04.Tamir' And [DataItem5] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem5] <> '10.Ön Sipariş' And [DataItem5] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem0] <> 'Hammadde' And [DataItem6] In (?Year)

Pie.Name: Müşteri Tipine Göre
Pie.FilterString: [DataItem2] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem4] In (?UretimDurum) And [DataItem3] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem3] <> '04.Tamir' And [DataItem3] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem3] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem1] <> 'Diğer' And [DataItem6] In (?Year)

Pie.Name: Boyama Tipine Göre
Pie.FilterString: [DataItem3] In (?EvrakDurum) And [DataItem4] In (?UretimDurum) And [DataItem0] <> 'FİTİL' And [DataItem0] <> 'VİGÜRE' And [DataItem0] <> 'TOPS' And [DataItem0] <> 'BUMBS' And [DataItem5] <> '03.Numune' And [DataItem5] <> '05.Stok' And [DataItem5] <> '04.Tamir' And [DataItem5] <> '20.T.Üretim' And [DataItem5] <> '10.Ön Sipariş' And [DataItem6] In (?Year)
